mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST (ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES(SEQ_POST.NEXTVAL, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.POST_TITLE, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.MEMBER_ID, TBM.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_POST TBP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBP.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID
